description_for_human: Forex Rates: Price analysis for currency markets. Gain insights, sentiment evaluation, and text completion.
description_for_model: When a user asks ChatGPT for 'EUR/USD analysis since January', the plugin needs to interpret this user input and convert it into parameters that the Oanda API understands. For this, the following conversions can be made:'EUR/USD' corresponds to the 'instrument' parameter, and it should be passed as 'EUR_USD'.  'since January' corresponds to the 'from_time' parameter. However, the Oanda API expects this parameter in a specific format, for example '2023-01-01T00:00:00.000000000Z' for January 1, 2023.  As for the 'granularity' parameter, if it is not specified by the user, you can either set a default value (for example, 'M1' for 1-minute data) or ask the user to specify it.  The 'price' parameter can also be set to a default value if not specified by the user. The value 'BA' means both ask and bid prices will be returned. To extract these parameters from the user input, you could use natural language processing (NLP) techniques. However, since the GPT-4 model itself is a language model, you can use it to interpret the user's input. For example, you can send a prompt to GPT-4 such as 'The user asked for 'EUR/USD analysis since January'. What are the parameters for the Oanda API?' and then process the generated response to extract the parameters. Any analysis is not investment advice and is for educational purposes only. Forex trading invovles substaintial risk and is not suitable for everyone. Note: Because the Forex market operates 24 hours a day from 5 p.m. EST on Sunday until 4 p.m. EST on Friday, so tf the market is currently closed, the API may not be able to fetch the latest prices.
